ygData.subject: Re: EQ - worse rpg ever?
ygData.msgSnippet: Tenzin Alexander, I think that the points that you brought up are very vaild.  I do not think that anyone should be ignoring them.  Or maybe I am just
ygData.messageBody:
Tenzin Alexander,

I think that the points that you brought up are very vaild. I do not think
that anyone should be 'ignoring' them. Or maybe I am just blowing some
smoke out my ass I dont know... I just think that to a point you are
correct... We all are striving for a better place to 'live' (even if it is
excapisim). What servers do ya play on? I know me and my group would love
to have an extra cleric along that would rp with us... as long as ya dont
mind the times we slip OOC. but as I have found out... the more some folks
are IC the more myself and others in the group will stay IC....

Just my 2 pp worth..


Jaxim
19th cirlce (and yes sooo damn close to the next) circle of enlightenment...

on the Tarew Marr server... In service to Tunare.




>From: Supafly16@...
>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] EQ - worse rpg ever?
>Date: Thu, 15 Jul 1999 11:21:13 EDT
>
>From: Supafly16@...
>
> Yes- I do agree with a lot of the messages. Nothing is ever perfect, and
>I
>chose to gripe about what was not perfect. Everquest is a great game
>besides
>the events I had to endure.
>Perhaps I did venture with some bad people- I have learned from the earlier
>posts that there are some great people out there in EQ. Perhaps I just have
>the worse luck in the world when I am grouping.
> I am sorry to place my anger on EQ on this mailing list. I just wish
>people
>wouldnt think about reaching that next level so much- but I have learned
>from
>the earlier posts that it is not true.
> I must have the worse luck on meeting people on the two servers I mainly
>play!! Sorry everyone :) igore my earlier posts :)
> T Alexander
